channel.title: Coffea Proclivitas
channel.description: Where I spend too much time thinking about roasting, brewing, and tasting coffee.

item.title: Hello, World.
item.description: Coffee is an interesting food that probably changed the course of history in the west. Coffee became a part of my own life at a time ofâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Coffee is an interesting food that probably changed the course of history in the west. Coffee became a part of my own life at a time of change as well.

This will be a place to post my own reference material for my coffee roasting, brewing, and tasting escapades.

Stay tuned.
